short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expands text shortcuts like .t to test

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Text Expander is a productivity extension designed to save time and effort by allowing you to create customizable shortcuts for frequently used phrases, emails, or responses. With this tool, you can expand small abbreviations into larger blocks of text instantly in any text input or editable field across all websites. Additionally, Text Expander provides the option to edit and delete existing shortcuts, ensuring that you can keep your list organized and up to date.
